creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

URC, in black: "Crippled Chang, carrying dishes of food off to visit kin, Meets Crippled Li along the way, talks 'causality' with him. The two men clap their hands in glee, and laugh out loud: 'Ha, ha!' Nowhere in this world is there a man who stands quite straight!'/ Ts'ao Hsi, copying T'ang Liu-ju"; to L of inscription, in red, on two seals: "LO-fu chü-shih" and "Ts'ao Hsi Chih-yin"
title: Crippled Zhang Meets Hunchback Li
